capstone/index.title: Capstone Project - Autonomous Humanoid
capstone/index.description: Integrating all concepts in a complete humanoid robot system

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: This comprehensive course covers essential concepts from ROS 2 architecture to Vision-Language-Action (VLA) robotic systems, bridging digital AI models with physical humanoid robots.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: Getting started with Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics

module-1-ros2/chapter-1-2-first-ros2-nod.description: Create and run your first ROS 2 node with Python and rclpy

module-1-ros2/chapter-1-3-communication-.description: Deep dive into topics, services, and actions communication patterns

module-1-ros2/chapter-1-4-message-types.description: Understanding standard message types and creating custom messages

module-1-ros2/chapter-1-5-parameters.description: Managing configuration through parameters, launch files, and parameter files

module-1-ros2/chapter-1-6-launch-files.description: Managing complex robotic systems with launch files and orchestration
